nodes.bodyText: Are you sure it's needed? It is also done just below.
Correct me if I'm wrong but i think you could do that even if !zeroChunkCount. All you have to do is to update chunkcount with chunkcount -= (lastchunk - lasttick) / chunkwidth.

You must add if (lastchunkid > newestChunk).
Also, the same idea as above comment can apply here: drop zeroChunkCount and update chunkcount with chunkcount -= (lastchunkid - newestChunk) / chunkwidth
Please update the comment to reflect the code below.
